Definition.WordDefinition: Mona, UT (town, FIPS 51140) Location: 39.81544 N, 111.85752 W Population (1990): 584 (183 housing units) Area: 3.5 sq km (land), 0.1 sq km (water) Zip code(s): 84645

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Mona \Mo"na\, n. [CF. Sp. & Pg. mona, fem. of mono a monkey, ape.] (Zo["o]l.) A small, handsome, long-tailed West American monkey ({Cercopithecus mona}). The body is dark olive, with a spot of white on the haunches. [1913 Webster]
Mona n : an island northwest of Wales [syn: {Anglesey}, {Anglesey Island}, {Anglesea}, {Anglesea Island}]
